snippet: After a trip to the Nuba mountains of southern Sudan, where he saw bombed villages and maimed children, the actor George Clooney visits Washington to bring attention to the bloody conflict.
abstract: After a trip to the Nuba mountains of southern Sudan, where he saw bombed villages and maimed children, the actor George Clooney visits Washington to bring attention to the bloody conflict.

headline.main: On Capitol Hill, George Clooney Testifies About Sudan
